title: Vintage Dave Allen
brief_description: For lovers of this great Irish comedian, this is a feast of his most brilliant monologues and sketches which were shown in Dave Allen’s television program. Allen selected the sketches himself and they celebrate twenty years of his association with the British Broadcasting Corporation.
